comments.body: This is a temporary hack to get the add version info into the tarball, since it was configured improperly due to a missing .gitattributes file. This will be fixed in the next released and this file removed.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@def get_versions():
    return json.loads(version_json)
EOF

python -m pip install . -vv
